main event: A bright metallic object was observed in the western sky over Bellbrook, Ohio for about 10-12 minutes on 29 March.
interesting points: The object reflected sunlight and changed direction and speed several times during the observation., It was identified as probably an aircraft., A separate witness reported seeing a triangular bright light moving rapidly on 30 March 1965., The witness observed the object for about a minute., Multiple witnesses in the Bellbrook area reported seeing the same object.
